Key Match Events: Mike Burrows made his MLB debut and gave up 1 earned run in 3⅓ innings.
Paul Skenes only threw two innings to manage his workload.
Burrows recorded his first career strikeout on a changeup.
Burrows got Aaron Judge to whiff badly on a fastball.
Post-Match Reflections: Burrows expressed excitement about his MLB debut and the support from his family and friends.
Pirates manager Derek Shelton praised Burrows' performance and recovery from Tommy John surgery.
Paul Skenes commended Burrows for seamlessly sliding into an unusual setup.
